title: How to Parboil Broccoli

steps.headline: Prepare the broccoli florets.
steps.description: Wash, cut, and dry before adding.

steps.headline: Prepare a pot with water.
steps.description: Bring it to the boil and add a little salt to it.

steps.headline: Place a handful of ice cubes into a large bowl.
steps.description: Pour chilled water into the rest of the bowl. Place this nearby so that you can reach it quickly.

steps.headline: Place the broccoli into the boiling water.
steps.description: Only cook it for 2 minutes or for however long your directions say.

steps.headline: Remove from the pot.
steps.description: Use tongs or a strainer to get the broccoli out quickly.

steps.headline: Plunge it into the bowl of ice water.
steps.description: This will "shock" the broccoli and immediately stop it cooking any further.

steps.headline: Once it is cool, drain the ice water and leave the broccoli in a colander ready for use as needed.
Use in the recipe of choice.
